citations.narrative:
During inspection if was found that at least ten of plastic containers used for grain in the enclosure with the goats and
alpaca had large cracks splitting the bottom of the containers. This could allow contamination of the feed from the ground
and prevents complete sanitations of the food containers.
All animals must have access to wholesome, palatable food that is free of contamination and in sufficient quantity and
nutritive value to maintain good health. All feeding receptacles must always be in good repair, clean and sanitary.
To be corrected by March 11th 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.129(b) 
   
Feeding. 
During inspection if was found that at least ten of plastic containers used for grain in the enclosure with the goats and 
alpaca had large cracks splitting the bottom of the containers. This could allow contamination of the feed from the ground 
and prevents complete sanitations of the food containers.  
All animals must have access to wholesome, palatable food that is free of contamination and in sufficient quantity and 
nutritive value to maintain good health. All feeding receptacles must always be in good repair, clean and sanitary.  
To be corrected by March 11th 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
